post.body: HA! & I'm living vicariously through u.Tell me, r you all lounging around the pool in your bikinis? Snow gets old REAL quick!
I'm sure the DQ GC would have been preferred but oh well...=)
Ya know what? I ended up at Target and didn't feel like making another stop to DQ so I found a game "cribbage" for $5.
you inspired me to make homemade hot chocolate for the kiddies.They been out building snowforts all morning.They thank you!=)
EEK! And you just got slammed with ice! Will make for an interesting Christmas. Bundle up!
TEACHERS please don't believe everything your students tell you! http://tinyurl.com/4kzpuu
My worst nightmare. I'm so sorry.
Yeah..."fun"....I can't even blog about this "fun" visit becuz I think she reads my blog.
YES! It's incredible!
That 12 year old of mine is getting a big ole fat lump of coal. And a size 7.5 boot up his rear!!!
Oh, and he has to come so he can finish wrapping all the presents...only 1/2 of the ones he brought were wrapped. He just didn't have time.
He comes xmas day (only if you leave him milk & cookies) to pull gifts from hiding spot.Cuz all those presents won't fit down the chimney.
Did ya'll know that Santa sometimes visits early and hides presents in your house to make Chrismas day easier for him? Tis true.
OMG I wanna cry.12y/o found Santa's stash and showed 9y/o and 6y/o. Santa has been ratted out & my 12y/o may not make it to his 13th bday.
Kids are still outside in the snow! They've been at it since 930 this morning. Minus a hot cocoa break!
Drive way has been plowed twice already this morning and it's still coming down.
Great news. Snowed in & state financial crisis = unplowed roads. YEAY!
No snow yet! Maybe weatherman is wrong?!?
son#1 "I'm gonna poke your eyeballs out"...Son#2 "no...don't....my contacts will fall out." They make me so proud...on so many levels.
So I'll be tossing salt over my shoulder, turning in 3 circles to the left, & sleeping in a head stand w/ arms & legs crossed so they DON'T!
"Mom, tonight b4 bed I have to put 3 ice cubes in the toilet, a spoon under my pillow, & wear my pjs inside out so we will have a snow day"
Winter storm warning. 10 - 12 inches expected. FanTAStic!!!!!!!
Stomach & head are fiercely protesting last night's festivities. UGH.
We're expecting 20 adults and 23 kids. Fun will be had by all. What are ya'll doing to bring in the new year?
Totally geeked about tomorrow night's annual New Years eve party. Nothing like starting the new year surrounded by our closest friends.
A.NOTH.ER night with the inlaws. *sigh*. I've had enough.
OMG my google reader is OUT. OF. CONTROl! time to blogsurf. Haven't read any blogs since...like....forever. I miss ya'll.
I think I need to create a secret anonamous(sp?) blog. Oh the stories I could tell.
Or drink another bottle of cheap wine....whatever...
but if I have to listen to 1 more political rant from my FIL or watch 1 more min ofGemshow TV I'm going to commit myself....
Day #8 w/ the inlaws & I'm not in a straight jacket yet .....
Just finished book 2 of the Twilight series.Just bought books 3 and 4 on my Kindle.This new toy of mine is proving to be dangerous.
Just returned from taking the fam to see Marley & Me. Saddest movie EVeR! I'm talking ugly cry here.
Just left Trader Joes with 5 cases of wine. You'd think we have a drinking probem or something.
I'm sorry, my mistake, it apparently was the booger fairy. My son "does NOT pick his nose".
He returned from cleaning it & said "You might want to tell your son to discontinue his booger collection on the side of his seat. niii ...
Hubby cleaned out my car becuz he's too embarrassed to let my inlaws see how we TRULY roll.
Reading New Moon on my new toy, The Kindle, I'm hooked & may never surface from this addiction long enough to write another blog post.
http://twitpic.com/w6hu - We're ready for ya Santa! Triple fudge ghirardelli brownies are waiting for u.
http://twitpic.com/w3z5 -
